name: svelte-preprocess
description: A Svelte preprocessor wrapper with baked in support for common used preprocessors
author: Christian Kaisermann <christian@kaisermann.me>

scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\u001b[36m\u001b[1m[svelte-preprocess] Don\'t forget to install the preprocessors packages that will be used: \u001b[22m\u001b[39m\u001b[34mnode-sass/sass, stylus, less, postcss &  postcss-load-config, coffeescript, pug, etc...\u001b[0m')"
scripts.version: npx conventional-changelog-cli -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.release: npm run version && npm i --package-lock-only && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: release v$npm_package_version"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run release && npm run tag
